item.title: CL
item.description: score:183 Chances: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) has started to reconfirm its growth expectations after strong quarterly results. The global growth outlook was given a boost, helping to ease concerns about crude demand. The company’s Pet Nutrition segment offers potential for growth in the consumer staples sector.
